Golf outlet offers the sport’s essentials ...  Center. (Eric Hodies/Freelance) There seems to be a change to the golf store at Regency Hilltop Shopping Center? A2Z Golf Outlet opened Feb. 15 in the space previously occupied by Addicted to Golf. Advertisement The Laskin Road storefront offers nearly 4,900-square-feet of clothes, accessories and club repair, according to owner Quirino Arzadon. A2Z sells footwear by Adidas, Asics, FootJoy and Puma, and an in-store hitting simulator is available. "Virginia Beach has so many great golf courses, and this is a great location for a golf store," Arzadon said. "Our community needs a family type place like this." Advertisement A2Z Golf Outlet is located in Suite 301 at 1940 Laskin Road, next to Running Etc. Eric Hodies, ehodies@hteam.net virginia ...
